name: treatment of non-Fe-Co-metals, from used Li-ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing | copper, cathode | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8872/documentation

The treatment of non-Fe-Co-metals fraction from used Li-ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing is based on the proxy "treatment of precious metal from electronics scrap, in anode slime, precious metal extraction". This proxy has been chosen because of the diverse composition of this fraction. The byproducts in the original dataset "silver, secondary, at precious metal refinery", "gold, secondary, at precious metal refinery" and "palladium, secondary, at precious metal refinery" have been deleted in order to adapt the dataset to the composition of the non-Fe-Co-metals fraction. The same has been done for the original outputs of Cadmium, Lead, Mercury and Zinc. The composition of the non-Fe-Cp-metals is 21% Copper, 14.4% Aluminium and 0.8% Lithium. The composition is calculated from the Li-Ion battery production, including cathode and anode components.The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly. 

The activity starts with the reception of non-Fe-Co-metals fraction from the treatment of Li-Ion battery, pyrometallurgical processing

The activity ends with the production of Copper. Aluminium and Lithium are burned during the process.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data is adapted from a Swedish plant that is singular in the region and ranges worldwide among the big producer. It may be taken as approximation for the global situation
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Based on technology that treats anode slime by pressure leaching and top blown rotary converter.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: this dataset is based on a proxy. The byproducts have been adapted to the composition of the treated product

exchanges.description: based on Li-ioin battery composition and pyrometallurgical treatment process. Substracted from copper emissions related to the original process for precious metal extraction

flow.name: copper, cathode
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
